title: [Placements] PESU grads who work at IBM
content: Anyone has any update if IBM is coming to campus this year? Like when theyâ€™re visiting and how many people they might take.

comments.body: Don't get your hopes up that they would mass hire again this year.
+1, really want to know at this point ðŸ˜…
They have hired 50 people from msrit, so yeah they will definitely hire that much from pes as well

Last year they took around 110+
It was 141 last year, but heard they laid off few of them
More like 30 ish from MSRIT this year
Still better, even if they hire around 50 from pes, would change the fate of placements at pes ðŸ˜…

Just know that few get to know .
Placement coordinators of dept very well have an idea, as they are in contact with placement cell
